body_html: Since, it took me way too much time to find it - and it may help someone - it turns out that import_meta_graph passes all additional arguments to the underlying import_scoped_meta_graph which has the input_map argument and utilizes when it gets to it's calling of import_graph. So, yes you can have modify graph while loading with import_meta_graph!
body_text: Since, it took me way too much time to find it - and it may help someone - it turns out that import_meta_graph passes all additional arguments to the underlying import_scoped_meta_graph which has the input_map argument and utilizes when it gets to it's calling of import_graph. So, yes you can have modify graph while loading with import_meta_graph!
body: Since, it took me way too much time to find it - and it may help someone - it turns out that `import_meta_graph` passes all additional arguments to the underlying `import_scoped_meta_graph` which **has** the `input_map` argument and utilizes when it gets to it's calling of `import_graph`. So, **yes** you can have modify graph while loading with `import_meta_graph`!
